title: Sensory Evaluation of Wine
description: Evaluation of wines using the techniques in sensory evaluation. Difference and rating tests; descriptive analysis and pairing of wine and food. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory. Formerly FSN/WVIT 342.
prerequisites: WVIT 202 and STAT 218; students must be at least 21 years in age; for WVIT majors only
